properties.name: app.url
properties.description: Url of the web server eg. 'http://localhost:5555/'.

properties.name: app.config.draft-cleanup-delay
properties.description: Delay in hours before unconfirmed drafts are cleaned up.

properties.name: app.config.deleted-event-cleanup-delay
properties.description: Delay in hours before deleted events are cleaned up. Giving an opportunity to restore them.

properties.name: app.config.bot-owner-id
properties.description: User id of the bot owner.
